link.help: Links your osu! account to your discord account
link.already_verified: Your account is already verified. Maybe you wanted to use the `%1%2register` command ?
link.success:
Please authenticate your osu! account by setting the following code

%1

 as your location on your osu! profile.

Once done, send the `%2%3auth` command.

auth.help: Links your osu! account to your discord account
auth.not_linked: Your account is not linked. Please run the `%1%2link $tosurnament/link/parameter` command.
auth.osu_error: Oops. An error has occured. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact me at spartan.plume@gmail.com
auth.wrong_code: Your location is not your given code. If you forgot your code or make a mistake in your username, please reuse the `%1%2link` command.
auth.success: Congrats, your account has been verified.

create_tournament.not_on_a_server: This command can only be ran on a server.
create_tournament.not_owner: You need to be the owner of the server to use this command.
create_tournament.acronym_used: This acronym is already used by another tournament in this server.

set_staff_channel.help: Sets the staff channel to ping staff role
set_staff_channel.not_on_a_server: This command can only be ran on a server.
set_staff_channel.not_owner: You need to be the owner of the server to use this command.
set_staff_channel.no_tournament: This server does not have any tournament running. Consider using the `%1%2create_tournament $tosurnament/create_tournament/parameter`.
set_staff_channel.no_rights: You don't have the rights to use this command.

set_admin_role.help: All of those with the role <role> can do admin command on the bot
set_admin_role.not_on_a_server: This command can only be ran on a server.
set_admin_role.not_owner: You need to be the owner of the server to use this command.
set_admin_role.no_tournament: This server does not have any tournament running. Consider using the `%1%2create_tournament $tosurnament/create_tournament/parameter`.

set_referee_role.not_on_a_server: This command can only be ran on a server.
set_referee_role.not_owner: You need to be the owner of the server to use this command.
set_referee_role.no_tournament: This server does not have any tournament running. Consider using the `%1%2create_tournament $tosurnament/create_tournament/parameter`.
set_referee_role.no_rights: You don't have the rights to use this command.

set_player_role.not_on_a_server: This command can only be ran on a server.
set_player_role.not_owner: You need to be the owner of the server to use this command.
set_player_role.no_tournament: This server does not have any tournament running. Consider using the `%1%2create_tournament $tosurnament/create_tournament/parameter`.
set_player_role.no_rights: You don't have the rights to use this command.

set_players_spreadsheet.help: Sets the players spreadsheet to allow registration
set_players_spreadsheet.not_on_a_server: This command can only be ran on a server.
set_players_spreadsheet.no_tournament: This server does not have any tournament running. Consider using the `%1%2create_tournament $tosurnament/create_tournament/parameter`.

register.help: Registers you and gives you the `Player` role on discord (if you're on the player list)
register.not_on_a_server: This command can only be ran on a server.
register.not_linked: Your account is not linked. Please run the `%1%2link <osu_username>` command.
register.not_verified: Your account is not verified. Please run the `%1%2auth` command.
register.osu_error: Oops. An error has occured. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact me at spartan.plume@gmail.com
register.no_tournament: This server does not have any tournament running. Consider using the `%1%2create_tournament $tosurnament/create_tournament/parameter`.
register.no_players_spreadsheet: This tournament does not have any players spreadsheet registered. Consider using the `%1%2set_players_spreadsheet $tosurnament/set_players_spreadsheet/parameter`.
register.spreadsheet_error: Either the spreadsheet's id is incorrect, or the ranges are incorrect, or we couldn't connect to the spreadsheet. If you are sure that it is a connection problem and that the problem persists, contact me at spartan.plume@gmail.com
register.change_nickname_forbidden: Sorry, I can't change your nickname. Either you have better rights than the bot or the bot doesn't have the `Change nicknames` right. Please contact an admin.
register.change_role_forbidden: Sorry, I can't add you the `%1` role. Either you have better rights than the bot or the bot doesn't have the `Manage roles` right. Please contact an admin.
register.no_player_role: There's no `Player` role. Ask an admin to create it.
register.not_a_player: You're not on the player list. I can't register you. ='(
